    • getTombolaLog

      @GetMapping(value={"/tombolaLog","/tombolaLog/page/{page}","/tombolaLog/page/{page}/sort/{sort}","/tombolaLog/page/{page}/sort/{sort}/filter/{filter}"}, produces="text/html") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_managerRole\', \'ROLE_adminRole\')") public String getTombolaLog(@PathVariable(value="page",required=false) Integer pg, @PathVariable(value="sort",required=false) String srt, @PathVariable(required=false) String filter, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      HTML Log

      The method getTombolaLog for /tombolaLog

      Accessible to the RoleType.MANAGER_ROLE and RoleType.ADMIN_ROLE

      Parameters:
      pg - Integer Number from 0. Zero is the first page
      srt - String Sort by [idD, idU, mD, mU, a0D, a0U, a1D, a1U, a2D, a2U, a3D, a3U, cU, cD, lU, lD]
      filter - String Empty or filter by [DEBUG, ERROR, INFO, WARN] or their combinations. Example: 'ERROR+WARN'
      request - HttpServletRequest
      model - Model
      Returns:
      "indexLog" for thymeleaf indexLog.html String
